Authorization.docs: API key for authentication. Format should be token <DEEPGRAM_API_KEY>
Authorization.name: authorization

body.docs: Conversation Text facilitates real-time communication by relaying spoken statements from both the user and the assistant
Get signals that the server has finished sending the final audio segment to the client
Receive an error message from the server when an error occurs
Send messages ensuring uninterrupted communication for your agent
Get notified when the server begins streaming an agent's audio response for playback
Agent Thinking informs the client when the agent is processing information
Request to call a function by sending a Function Call Request message
Configure the voice agent and configure the function call response
Provides insights into function call workflows to assist in debugging
Send a message to change the Speak model in the middle of a conversation
Receive injection refused message
Confirm the server has successfully received and applied the Settings Configuration message
Configure the voice agent and sets the input and output audio formats
Send a message to give additional instructions to the Think model in the middle of a conversation
Send a message to change the Speak model in the middle of a conversation
User Started Speaking notifies the client that the user has begun speaking
Receive a welcome message from the server to confirm the websocket has opened

AgentAudioDone.docs: Get signals that the server has finished sending the final audio segment to the client

type.docs: Message type identifier indicating the agent has finished sending audio

AgentErrorResponse.docs: Receive an error message from the server when an error occurs

message.docs: A description of what went wrong

type.docs: Message type identifier for error responses

AgentKeepAlive.docs: Send messages ensuring uninterrupted communication for your agent

type.docs: Message type identifier for agent keep alive signal

AgentStartedSpeaking.docs: Get notified when the server begins streaming an agent's audio response for playback

total_latency.docs: Seconds from receiving the user's utterance to producing the agent's reply

tts_latency.docs: The portion of total latency attributable to text-to-speech

ttt_latency.docs: The portion of total latency attributable to text-to-text (usually an LLM)

type.docs: Message type identifier for agent started speaking

AgentThinking.docs: Agent Thinking informs the client when the agent is processing information

content.docs: The text of the agent's thought process

type.docs: Message type identifier for agent thinking

ConversationText.docs: Conversation Text facilitates real-time communication by relaying spoken statements from both the user and the assistant

content.docs: The actual statement that was spoken

type.docs: Message type identifier for conversation text

FunctionCallRequest.docs: Request to call a function by sending a Function Call Request message

function_call_id.docs: Unique identifier to correlate the response with this request

function_name.docs: The name specified in the function definition

input.docs: Parameters defined for this function in the function definition

type.docs: Message type identifier for function call requests

FunctionCallResponse.docs: Configure the voice agent and configure the function call response

function_call_id.docs: The unique identifier matching the original function call request

output.docs: The result of the function call execution

type.docs: Message type identifier for function call responses

FunctionCalling.docs: Provides insights into function call workflows to assist in debugging

type.docs: Message type identifier for function calling status

InjectAgentMessage.docs: Send a message to change the Speak model in the middle of a conversation

message.docs: The statement that the agent should say

type.docs: Message type identifier for injecting an agent message
Message type identifier for injection refused

SettingsApplied.docs: Confirm the server has successfully received and applied the Settings Configuration message

type.docs: Message type identifier for settings applied confirmation

SettingsConfiguration.docs: Configure the voice agent and sets the input and output audio formats

keyterms.docs: List of keyterms to listen for, only available on nova-3

model.docs: Model to use for speech recognition

voice_id.docs: Unique voice identifier for the selected provider

description.docs: Description of function purpose and usage

messages.docs: LLM message history for conversation restoration

replay.docs: Whether to replay the last assistant message

UpdateInstructions.docs: Send a message to give additional instructions to the Think model in the middle of a conversation

textToSpeech.yml.rawContents:
types:
  SpeakRequestContainer:
    enum:
      - wav
      - ogg
    default: wav
    source:
      openapi: ../openapi.yml
  SpeakRequestSpeakEncoding:
    enum:
      - linear16
      - flac
      - mulaw
      - alaw
      - mp3
      - opus
      - aac
    default: mp3
    source:
      openapi: ../openapi.yml
  SpeakRequestSpeakModel:
    enum:
      - value: aura-asteria-en
        name: AuraAsteriaEn
      - value: aura-luna-en
        name: AuraLunaEn
      - value: aura-stella-en
        name: AuraStellaEn
      - value: aura-athena-en
        name: AuraAthenaEn
      - value: aura-hera-en
        name: AuraHeraEn
      - value: aura-orion-en
        name: AuraOrionEn
      - value: aura-arcas-en
        name: AuraArcasEn
      - value: aura-perseus-en
        name: AuraPerseusEn
      - value: aura-angus-en
        name: AuraAngusEn
      - value: aura-orpheus-en
        name: AuraOrpheusEn
      - value: aura-helios-en
        name: AuraHeliosEn
      - value: aura-zeus-en
        name: AuraZeusEn
    default: aura-asteria-en
    source:
      openapi: ../openapi.yml
imports:
  root: __package__.yml
service:
  auth: false
  base-path: ''
  endpoints:
    speak:
      path: /v1/speak
      method: POST
      auth:
        - ApiKeyAuth: []
      docs: Convert text into natural-sounding speech using Deepgram's TTS API
      source:
        openapi: ../openapi.yml
      display-name: Text to Speech transformation
      request:
        name: SpeakRequest
        query-parameters:
          bit_rate:
            type: optional<integer>
            docs: >-
              The bitrate of the audio in bits per second. Choose from
              predefined ranges or specific values based on the encoding type.
            validation:
              min: 4000
              max: 192000
          callback:
            type: optional<string>
            docs: URL to which we'll make the callback request
          container:
            type: optional<SpeakRequestContainer>
            default: wav
            docs: >-
              Container specifies the file format wrapper for the output audio.
              The available options depend on the encoding type.
          speak_encoding:
            type: optional<SpeakRequestSpeakEncoding>
            default: mp3
            docs: >-
              Encoding allows you to specify the expected encoding of your audio
              output
          speak_model:
            type: optional<SpeakRequestSpeakModel>
            default: aura-asteria-en
            docs: AI model used to process submitted text
          speak_sample_rate:
            type: optional<integer>
            docs: >-
              Sample Rate specifies the sample rate for the output audio. Based
              on the encoding, different sample rates are supported. For some
              encodings, the sample rate is not configurable
        body:
          properties:
            text:
              type: string
              docs: The text content to be converted to speech
        content-type: application/json
      response:
        docs: Successful text to speech
        type: file
        status-code: 200
      errors:
        - root.SpeakRequestBadRequestError
        - root.SpeakRequestForbiddenError
        - root.SpeakRequestContentTooLargeError
        - root.SpeakRequestUnsupportedMediaTypeError
  source:
    openapi: ../openapi.yml
  display-name: Text to Speech
docs: Transform text to speech
